title.rendered: Forms for Faculty: Study Tours and Travel Abroad

content.rendered:
The forms downloadable below should be used by faculty to plan and lead responsible and safe study tours abroad.  The Study Abroad Office provides these documents to faculty so that they have information needed to prepare for and implement their study tours abroad.  The Risk Management waivers must be completed and accident reports filed.  All Study Tours abroad must be approved by the faculty member’s academic department and college dean.

Study Abroad Office Documents
  • Behavioral Standards for Students
  • Financial Guidelines for Faculty Leaders
  • Incident Occurrence Report
  • Medical Clearance Form
  • Preparing to Teach and Study Abroad
  • Program Guidelines for Faculty Leaders
  • Sample Application: Short Term Study and Travel Programs
  • Student Travel Guidelines
Risk Management Documents
  • Accident Report
  • Check List from Risk Management
  • International Travel With Students Request Form (Required for U.S. Department of State Level 3 Countries)
  • Waiver of Liability for Extended Stay
